title: Strengthening Instructional Practical Competencies: Game-Based Learning (GBL) Design Expert Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain ten or more core GBL principles (immersion, feedback, challenges, etc.) and apply them to real-world cases.
Design one educational game prototype within 3 hours using the card-based design tool (LEAGUE Toolkit).
Evaluate the validity of GBL design based on five criteria from the perspectives of multiple stakeholders (educators, developers, learners).
Plan and create storyboards for at least two types of GBL content implementable in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
